title: X-Men v4 03 (2013) (Tablet Edition)
description:
I adjusted the resolution and compression of the original scan for easier reading on tablets and to save space. All credit goes to the original scanner for their hard work. I have added 'Tablet Edition' to the name to avoid confusion.

Enjoy and please seed back.


X-Men 03

By:   	Brian Wood, Olivier Coipel, Amanda Connor	
Type:   	Comics
Genres:   	Superhero
Series:   	X-Men
Publisher:   	Marvel Comics	
Pub. Date:  	July 31, 2013
Format:         CBZ

The X-Men find out what Arkea is capable of, and the phrase "rampaging horde" comes to mind.

Can Arkea be defeated? Can the X-Men take down one of their own, if that's what it takes?

Meanwhile, what's up with Sublime and Rachel? What's up with Bling and Cipher? What's up with Jubilee and Bling?
